property.name: hbase.replication
property.description: This is an HBase setting, not an hbase-indexer setting. Since HBase Indexer (or technically, the SEP) is based on replication, this should always be true.

property.name: hbaseindexer.indexer.threads
property.description: The number of threads that should concurrently perform indexing (per indexer).

property.name: hbaseindexer.zookeeper.znode.parent
property.description: Root ZNode for HBase Indexer in ZooKeeper.

property.name: hbaseindexer.defaults.for.version
property.description: This defaults file was compiled for version @@@VERSION@@@. This variable is used to make sure that a user doesn't have an old version of hbase-indexer-default.xml on the classpath.

property.name: hbaseindexer.lifecycle.listeners
property.description: A list of class names that implement the IndexerLifecycleListener interface. Instances of these listeners live in the IndexerMaster.

property.name: hbaseindexer.metrics.ganglia.interval
property.description: Reporting interval to Ganglia, in seconds
